body.name: Meihengtong Bluetooth Receipt Printer Thermal Portable Wireless POS Printer for Small Business 58mm Mini Mobile Ticket Printer for Android & Windows
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
Or fastest pickup Tuesday, February 13. Order within 1 hr 9 mins
features: ✅[Basic Funtion] This mobile bluetooth receipt printer has a large paper warehouse, supporting a 50mm diameter. Printer built-in rechargeable 1500mAh lithium-ion battery, standby time can reach 5 - 6 days. Bluetooth 4.0 printer, with auto sleep, auto awake function, save electricity. A suitable mobile printer for vehicles.

✅[Wide Compatibility] Thermal receipt printer supports Seven POS software: Loyverse(Retail/Clothing/logo print), iREAP(Retail/Inventory), CasierStock(Shopping/Inventory Management), Kyte(Mobile Sales),Pozool(Restaurant/Coffee Shop), Cashsale POS(Restaurant), ExpressExpense (Express billing receipt) for android devices.

✅[DO NOT Support] Does not work with iOS devices like iPad tablet,iPhone.DO NOT Support Square, Doorbash, Grubhub, Gloriafood,Mac, Clover,Open Table, /PayPal/Intuit Gopayment/Shopify/Credit Card Reader/izettle/FileMake Go.
✅[Battery Tips] Battery comes with insulation paste. Remember to peel off before usage. Print commands: ESC&POS
✅[Instructions] Portable receipt printer's manual will provide important instructions for use. To use the 58mm receipt printer on the Windows device, need to download the driver software first.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 58mm Portable Mobile Thermal Printer, 2 Inch Bluetooth Receipt Printer, great for carrying it out to Small Business whatever outdoor or indoor.The thermal Receipt Printer is widely applied for retail stores, restaurants, kitchens, food trucks, hotels, supermarkets,s and so on. what's more, You can use the Bluetooth thermal receipt printer for printing receipts, tickets, images, text, and store logos. For the logo set, you can find it from the "setting tool" in the Driver.For more detail on the printing, you can adjust it in the setting tool, please refer to the guide manual.Any questions about setting the Bluetooth or printing, our tech can assist you.

Important Tips: these are for Android devices only. Do not work with iOS devices like iPad tablets, iPhones.The Bluetooth receipt printer is compatible with Android and Windows devices. Don't support iOS and MAC systems.This supports POS software like: Loyverse(Retail/Clothing/logo print), iREAP(Retail/Inventory), CasierStock(Shopping/Inventory Management), Kyte(Mobile Sales),Pozool(Restaurant/Coffee Shop), Cashsale POS(Restaurant), ExpressExpense (Express billing receipt) ,Tabshop(retail store),Paypal(small business for your self at home),Vyapar(car sale ),03POS(logistics or library)or Android devices.DO NOT support Square, Open Table, MobiPOS Lite and Intuit Gopayment/Shopify/Credit Card Reader/izettle/FileMake Go. Please confirm with the seller if it supports your application before ordering.Before using with Windows computer, you need to install the driver, and the USB Cable completely plugs into your printer. the receipt printer need to download the printer driver two times for USB and Bluetooth connection.IF your software is not in the list provided, we can provide SDK to integrate into your own application for IOS and Android

Direct thermal technology printing, no need for ink or ribbon, carbon, Healthy & friendly & tidy & clean. The receipt printer can be logo print, multiple languages, IDBarcode Print,2DBarcode Print, print what you need. 50MM (diameter) larger paper storehouse to print 150 receipts more than others with one roll of paper. No need to change paper frequently. The Bluetooth receipt printer with an open cover, it's convenient to open and load the thermal paper, fast to begin your printing, and raises 30% working efficiency.
Battery:7.4VDC/2500mA Charging mode: DC 9V/1.5A Standby Time:5-6 days after fully charged

What you get ? 1 x Thermal Receipt Printer1 x Thermal Paper Roll1 x US Power Adapter1 x USB Cable1 x User Manual Portable & Save Place Light in weight, portable design, You can put it in your pocket to hang on your waist anytime and anywhere. Simply for paper installation, easy maintenance, and excellent structure Long Standby Time The battery comes with insulation paste. Remember to peel it off before usage. Charging method: by power adaptor. (Not a USB cable)
